title: I enjoy Nexus Blitz quite a bit, but I have a few criticisms
body:
For starters, I think 5 vs 5 is way to crowded on such a small map. There’s nothing wrong with that but the problem I have is that it has almost an ARAM like feel. 

GA buff needs to be removed. Shield buff needs to be toned down. Towers are getting buffed but I’d argue they still need to be a little stronger and probably need to do more damage given how easy it is to play around the towers. 

Other than that, I actually really enjoy it.
